jollyRoger: A clown skull with crossed bones and a red nose

keyMoments.title: Alliance with Alvida Pirates
keyMoments.description: Buggy agrees to form an alliance with Alvida and her crew to pursue their common enemy, Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Creates the Buggy-Alvida alliance that will appear in future episodes.

affiliations.description: Allied with Alvida Pirates to pursue Monkey D. Luffy

goals: Find and defeat Monkey D. Luffy

keyMoments.title: Alliance with Buggy Pirates
keyMoments.description: Alvida proposes and forms an alliance with Buggy to pursue their mutual enemy, Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Creates the Buggy-Alvida alliance that will play a role in future arcs.

affiliations.description: Allied with Buggy Pirates to pursue Monkey D. Luffy

goals: Find and defeat Monkey D. Luffy
